trans-unit.source: Provides data for the SourceChanged event, used for interoperation.
trans-unit.target: 为 SourceChanged 事件提供数据以用于互操作。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The SourceChanged event is a routed event where the event identifier is not publicly exposed.
trans-unit.target: SourceChanged 事件是其中的事件标识符不公开公开路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This is because this event plays a potentially critical part in interoperation and should not be allowed to be raised arbitrarily by any other source than the internal implementation of a known <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource> subclass (currently, the only such class is <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>).
trans-unit.target: 这是因为此事件在间的互操作中扮演潜在的严重的一部分，并且不应允许通过任何其他源而不是已知的内部实现任意引发<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>子类 (目前，唯一的这种类是<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>).

trans-unit.source: When implementing an interoperation solution, you can attach or remove handlers for the event (by calling <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>, respectively) but you cannot perform other operations normally available to routed events such as class handling, adding owners, or raising the event from an arbitrary element source.
trans-unit.target: 在实现互操作的解决方案时，你可以附加或移除事件处理程序 (通过调用<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>分别) 但不是能执行通常可用于路由的事件，例如类处理其他操作正在将所有者，添加或引发中的任意元素源的事件。

trans-unit.source: This class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs> virtual method <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, in order to return a type-specific handler when requested by the event system.
trans-unit.target: 此类重写<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs>虚拟方法<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，以便返回特定类型的处理程序的事件系统请求。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs> override does not appear in the class members table in this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)] documentation because it is a protected member implemented by a sealed class.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs>替代未在此类成员表中显示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)]文档因为它是由一个密封类实现的受保护的成员。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that this handler is being notified about.
trans-unit.target: 向此处理程序通知其信息的旧 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that this handler is being notified about.
trans-unit.target: 向此处理程序通知其信息的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs" /> class, using supplied information for the old and new sources.
trans-unit.target: 使用为旧源和新源提供的信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that this handler is being notified about.
trans-unit.target: 向此处理程序通知其信息的旧 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that this handler is being notified about.
trans-unit.target: 向此处理程序通知其信息的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The element whose parent changed causing the source to change.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素，其更改的父项导致源发生更改。

trans-unit.source: The old parent of the element whose parent changed causing the source to change.
trans-unit.target: 元素的旧父项，其更改的父项导致源发生更改。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs" /> class, using supplied information for the old and new sources, the element that this change effects, and the previous reported parent of that element.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用为旧源和新源提供的信息、此更改影响的元素以及以前报告的该元素的父项，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SourceChangedEventArgs" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element whose parent change causing the presentation source information to change.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个元素，其父项更改导致表示源信息发生更改。

trans-unit.source: The element that is reporting the change.
trans-unit.target: 报告更改的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new source involved in this source change.
trans-unit.target: 获取此源更改中涉及的新源。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to get this value.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取此值。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous parent of the element whose parent change causing the presentation source information to change.
trans-unit.target: 获取元素以前的父项，该元素的父项更改导致表示源信息发生更改。

trans-unit.source: The previous parent element source.
trans-unit.target: 以前的父元素源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the old source involved in this source change.
trans-unit.target: 获取此源更改中涉及的旧源。

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 旧的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to get this value.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取此值。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
